sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: [#3] Volume goes to max and delayed — Fixed an issue where the app volume would unexpectedly jump to maximum, respond with delay, and the slider would disappear unexpectedly.
[#2] Buttons off screen — Resolved black bar issues in landscape mode causing buttons to go off-screen.
[#1] Caching in XP tab broken — Fixed a caching issue that caused missing or outdated data in the XP tab.
